description: A tool for reorienting an image to match the approximate orientation of standard template images (MNI152).

input_image.title: Input image
input_image.description: Input image to be reoriented (NIfTI format, e.g. img.nii.gz)

output_image.title: Output image
output_image.description: Output image with the reoriented result (NIfTI format, e.g. reoriented_img.nii.gz). If not provided, transformation matrix is output to standard output.

matrix_file.title: Matrix file
matrix_file.description: File to save the transformation matrix
